get.summary: Get the regions and skus that are available for RI purchase for the specified Azure subscription.

parameters.name: reservedResourceType
parameters.description: The type of the resource for which the skus should be provided.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Filters the skus based on the location specified in this parameter. This can be an Azure region or global

parameters.name: publisherId
parameters.description: Publisher id used to get the third party products

parameters.name: offerId
parameters.description: Offer id used to get the third party products

parameters.name: planId
parameters.description: Plan id used to get the third party products

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: May be used to filter by Catalog properties. The filter supports 'eq', 'or', and 'and'.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of reservations to skip from the list before returning results

parameters.name: $take
parameters.description: To number of reservations to return

schema.description: The list of catalogs and pagination information.

items.description: Product details of a type of resource.

resourceType.description: The type of resource the sku applies to.

billingPlans.description: The billing plan options available for this sku.

terms.description: Available reservation terms for this resource

items.description: The set of locations that the sku is available. If not specified, the sku is available in all locations.

name.description: An invariant to describe the feature.

value.description: An invariant if the feature is measured by quantity.

p1Y.description: Amount in pricing currency. Tax not included.

currencyCode.description: The ISO 4217 3-letter currency code for the currency used by this purchase record.

p3Y.description: Amount in pricing currency. Tax not included.

currencyCode.description: The ISO 4217 3-letter currency code for the currency used by this purchase record.

p5Y.description: Amount in pricing currency. Tax not included.

currencyCode.description: The ISO 4217 3-letter currency code for the currency used by this purchase record.

type.description: The type of restrictions.

values.description: The value of restrictions. If the restriction type is set to location. This would be different locations where the sku is restricted.

name.description: An invariant to describe the feature.

value.description: An invariant if the feature is measured by quantity.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

totalItems.description: The total amount of catalog items.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Information needed for calculate or purchase reservation

location.description: The Azure region where the reserved resource lives.

reservedResourceType.description: The type of the resource that is being reserved. In addition to below types we have also added the following: OpenAIPTU, MDC, Sentinel.

billingScopeId.description: Subscription that will be charged for purchasing reservation or savings plan

quantity.description: Quantity of the skus that are part of the reservation.

appliedScopes.description: List of the subscriptions that the benefit will be applied. Do not specify if AppliedScopeType is Shared. This property will be deprecated and replaced by appliedScopeProperties instead for Single AppliedScopeType.

managementGroupId.description: Fully-qualified identifier of the management group where the benefit must be applied.

resourceGroupId.description: Fully-qualified identifier of the resource group.

renew.description: Setting this to true will automatically purchase a new reservation on the expiration date time.

reservedResourceProperties.description: Properties specific to each reserved resource type. Not required if not applicable.

instanceFlexibility.description: Turning this on will apply the reservation discount to other VMs in the same VM size group. Only specify for VirtualMachines reserved resource type.

reviewDateTime.description: This is the date-time when the Azure hybrid benefit needs to be reviewed.
